== Introduction ==
BlankOn Linux is a distribution which is targetted for schools and small to medium enterprises in Indonesia. Based on Ubuntu Upstream Package and modified for Indonesia Ubuntu User. Coming from Blank then On word

=== Branding ===
{{http://dev.blankonlinux.or.id/chrome/site/blankon.png}}

=== Sponsor ===
This Project is sponsored by;

 1. <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-id.org|Indonesian Ubuntu Loco Team]]</nowiki>

 1. <nowiki>[[http://ypli.or.id|YPLI]]</nowiki>

 1. At version 2 Blankon has been sponsored by Unesco

Launchpad Page: https://launchpad.net/blankon

== Audience ==
Indonesian Ubuntu User, Business User, Education User, Small and Medium Business in Indonesia

== Mission ==
The main focus of this derivative is to meet the requirements of Indonesian users, provide services about Ubuntu, make distro more lineweight but based at GNOME desktop

== Goals ==
# Provided Lineweight Distro and easy to use
# Mentoring Ubuntu Indonesian user to be a Packager
== Collaboration Focuses ==
# Debungging and Triagging Bug
# Artwork Team
# Documentation Team
# Edubuntu Team
# REVU Team

== Release ==
 1. Version 1.0 (Bianglala) Based on Fedora linux

 1. <nowiki>[[ftp:--dl2.foss-id.web.id-iso-blankon-konde-rilis-blankon-2.0-alternate-i386.iso|Version 2.0]]</nowiki> (Konde) Based on Ubuntu Gutsy

 1. Version 3.0 (Lontara) Based on Ubuntu Hardy. this release have two variant

  1. Standard version ftp://dl2.foss-id.web.id/iso/blankon/lontara/rilis/lontara-i386-cdlive.iso

  1. Minimalist editon (lineweight) ftp://dl2.foss-id.web.id/iso/blankon/lontara/rilis/lontara-i386-cdlive.minimalist.iso

 1. Version 4.0 (Meuligoe) based on Ubuntu Intrepid
